text.tspan: The Dalmation of Faust makes for an
achingly funny hour in the theatre
...fun which doesn't stop for an entire hour
Two Shades of Blue theatre company have
come up with some of the worst puns
One from the Mel Brooks school of literary adaptation...
a barrage of bad puns and camp spoofery in a titanic struggle
between giggles and groans from the audience.
